    • Method Detail

      • bulkSetAccountDarkColors

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PUT(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> bulkSetAccountDarkColors(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                       @Body
                                                                                                                                                                       java.util.List<BrandingColor> body)
        Updates an array of dark theme branding colors. Update an array of dark theme branding colors of a tenant account. **Example:** ``` curl -X PUT https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id)/branding-colors/dark \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ '[{ \"reference\": \"primary\", \"color\": \"#f3f93e\" }]' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        body - List of branding colors. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • bulkSetAccountLightColors

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PUT(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/light")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> bulkSetAccountLightColors(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                         @Body
                                                                                                                                                                         java.util.List<BrandingColor> body)
        Updates an array of light theme branding colors. Update an array of light theme branding colors of a tenant account. **Example:** ``` curl -X PUT https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id)/branding-colors/light \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ '[{ \"reference\": \"primary\", \"color\": \"purple\" }]' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        body - List of branding colors. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getAccountDarkColor

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark/{reference}")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingColor> getAccountDarkColor(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                           @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String reference)
        Get dark theme branding color. Retrieve the requested dark theme branding color. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark/{reference} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - The name of the branding color. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingColor>

      • getAccountDarkColors

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingColorList> getAccountDarkColors(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                    java.lang.String accountId)
        Get dark theme branding colors. Retrieve dark theme branding colors for an account. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingColorList>

      • resetAccountDarkColor

        @DELETE(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark/{reference}")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingColor> resetAccountDarkColor(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String reference)
        Reset branding color to default. Resets the branding color of a tenant account to its dark theme default. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark/{reference} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - The name of the branding color. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingColor>

      • resetAccountLightColor

        @DELETE(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/light/{reference}")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingColor> resetAccountLightColor(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                  @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String reference)
        Reset branding color to default. Resets the branding color of a tenant account to its light theme default. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/light/{reference} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - The name of the branding color. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingColor>

      • setAccountDarkColor

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PUT(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/dark/{reference}")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingColor> setAccountDarkColor(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                             @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String reference,
                                                                                                                                                                             @Body
                                                                                                                                                                             BrandingColor body)
        Updates a dark theme branding color. Update a dark theme branding color of a tenant account. **Example:** ``` curl -X PUT https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id)/branding-colors/dark/primary \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '{ \"color\": \"#f3f93e\" }' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - The name of the branding color. (required)
        body - The branding color. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingColor>

      • setAccountLightColor

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PUT(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-colors/light/{reference}")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingColor> setAccountLightColor(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)

                                                                                                                                                                               @Body
                                                                                                                                                                               BrandingColor body)
        Updates light theme branding color. Update a light theme branding color of a tenant account. **Example:** ``` curl -X PUT https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id)/branding-colors/light/primary \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '{ \"color\": \"purple\" }' ```
